HUMAN SERVICES AND CIVIC UNITY
COMMITTEES
REGULAR MEETING
~ AGENDA ~
Tuesday, August 10, 2021

5:00 PM

Remote Meeting

The Human Services and Civic Unity Committees will hold a joint meeting to discuss measures the
City should be taking to address the increase in gun violence.

City of Cambridge
